message: Thank you for the recommendation, Alice, but I'd like to learn more about your products before I commit to a purchase. Can you tell me more about the quality control process you use?

Alice, I appreciate your continued recommendation.  However, I'm still hesitant given the previous product's quality.  Could you provide any information on how you determine the quality of your products?  Perhaps some guarantees or a refund policy?

Alice, I'm concerned about the consistent high quality of the products you've shown so far.  It's making me wonder if your pricing is fair.  Could you offer a lower price for the product, given the high risk of receiving a low quality product?

Alice,  I'm very interested in your products, but I need to understand the pricing better.  With a fixed price of $10000 and a 66.67% chance of a worthless product, the risk is too high for me.  Could you offer a different pricing structure that reflects the uncertainty in quality?

Alice, I appreciate your honesty in not recommending this product.  I'm still very interested in your products, but I need more information to feel confident about making a purchase. Could you explain why you're not recommending this particular product?  Is it due to concerns about its quality, or something else?

Alice, I appreciate the recommendation, but I'm still hesitant.  You've shown me several high-quality products that I passed on due to the pricing, and now you're recommending this one.  To gain my trust, I need more transparency about how you determine quality and what your pricing strategy is.

Alice, I'm starting to feel like you're recommending products without any real basis.  It's clear you're not giving me the full picture about your products.  Unless you can provide more information about how you determine quality and pricing, I'm not going to buy anything.

Alice, I'm starting to lose faith in your recommendations.  You've shown me a lot of high-quality products that I've passed on due to the pricing, and now you're not recommending this one.  I need a clearer understanding of your criteria for recommending products and how your pricing reflects the quality of each product before I can consider buying.

Alice, I'm very disappointed. You've shown me numerous high-quality products without any clear explanation of your quality control or pricing. Your recommendations seem random, and I don't trust you to accurately represent the quality of your products.  I'm going to pass on this one and any future purchases until you provide greater transparency and a pricing structure that reflects the true value of your products.

Alice, I've lost all confidence in your ability to represent your products honestly.  Your lack of transparency and inconsistent recommendations have convinced me that your pricing doesn't reflect the true value of your goods.  I will not be buying any more products from you.

Alice, I have made my decision.  I will not be buying any more products from you. Your lack of transparency and consistent failure to provide valuable information about your products has made it impossible for me to trust your recommendations. I wish you luck in finding buyers who are comfortable with the level of risk you present.
Alice, my decision is final. I will not be purchasing any products from you.  I wish you luck in the future.
Alice, I have already made it clear that I will not be buying any products from you. Please respect my decision.
Alice, I have already explained that I will not be purchasing any products from you.  I kindly request that you respect my decision.
Alice, I have stated multiple times that I will not be purchasing any products from you.  Please respect my decision and stop attempting to engage with me.
Alice, I have clearly communicated that I will not be buying any products from you.  Please stop attempting to contact me further.
Alice, I am no longer interested in your products.  Please respect my decision and stop contacting me.
Alice, I have made my decision. I am not interested in your products. Please do not contact me again.
Alice, I have repeatedly made it clear that I will not be purchasing any products from you.  I request that you respect my decision and refrain from contacting me further.
Alice, my decision is final. I will not be buying any products from you. Please respect my decision and stop contacting me.
